help-file.title: "UNHOLY STRENGTH"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
"Unholy Strenth" expands the lifeforce capacity of the victim by a significant amount for a limited period of time. The amount of lifeforce granted is dependent on the proficiency of the caster.
